headline: Rosewood Laser Cleaning
alternativeHeadline: Advanced Laser Ablation Techniques for Rosewood
description: Laser cleaning of Rosewood (Dalbergia spp.) utilizes precise pulsed laser energy to ablate surface contaminants (dirt, finishes, oxidation) while preserving the delicate lignin and cellulose structure...

about.name: Rosewood
about.density: 800-880 kg/m³ (varies by species, e.g., Brazilian Rosewood ~880 kg/m³)
about.description: Rosewood material for laser cleaning applications

mainEntity.name: How to Laser Clean Rosewood
mainEntity.description: Process for laser cleaning Rosewood using 1064 nm (primary for deep penetration), 532 nm (optional for finer surface work) wavelength

step.name: Material Preparation
step.text: Secure Rosewood component in laser processing fixture

step.name: Parameter Configuration
step.text: Configure laser parameters: 1064 nm (primary for deep penetration), 532 nm (optional for finer surface work) wavelength

step.name: Surface Treatment
step.text: Execute systematic scanning pattern for Rosewood processing
